title: Acceptance logic management
subtitle: Create rules of storage deal acceptance based on the current state of the sealing pipeline, basefee, Fil price and moreâ€¦
requirements: The acceptance logic module applies only to online deals and requires consideration of the mining software in use, as the elements differ between Curio and Boost. When migrating from Boost to Curio, you must adapt your acceptance logic, especially if you are using "Sector States" specific to Boost.

setToDefault.tooltip: Set this acceptance logic as default

error.onUpdateDefaultAcceptanceLogic: Unable to update default acceptance logic. Try in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onDeleteAcceptanceLogic: Unable to delete acceptance logic. Try in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.

empty.title: There are no acceptance logics under this miner. A default acceptance logic must be created to use CIDgravity.

error.generic: Unable to load storage acceptance logics. Try in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
